summary: When a brutal carjacking yields a videocamera, a teenage boy decides to document his life and the lives of his fellow gangbangers.
cast: Darris Love|Darontay McClendon|Don Cambell|Six Reasons|Trivell|Sonja Marie|Aura Ruiz|Tasheia Woodward|Andrew Stoddard|Michelle McGinty|Rochelle|Kevin Wiseman|Dwayne Whitehead|Bruce Lemon|Champagne Powell|Nancy Whitworth|Nana Murphy|Tramonde Myers|Lil' Skrappy|Celeste Bowen|Kojo Lewis|Bradrick Walker|Lavale Booth|Lafayette Braxton|Aletha Spann|Hajii King|T. Dennis|Lance Peters|Shirley Hill|Boo Kapone
title: Gang Tapes
